name: Task Timing or Task Frequency: Formal request/RFI
Test Required: Temperture, slump and strength
Task Timing or Task Frequency: Per Mix Design
• 1 Set of 3 tests for every 50m³ testing at the plant and 100m³ on site.
• Slump test on first 2 trucks from each plant.
• Then visual slump test for the pours over 20m³ and intermitted/random testing every 100m³.
• Slump Test, Air Content Test, Compressive strength test results, shrinkage strain
Task Timing or Task Frequency: As Per above
Task Timing or Task Frequency: As Per above
Test Required: Shrinkage strain at 56 days
Task Timing or Task Frequency: As Per above
Test Required: Approved shop drawings prior to fabrication
Task Timing or Task Frequency: 10 Days before commencing fabrication
Comments: Applicable to embedded items. Structural Steel ITP will cover material conformance
Supply of Reinforcement -  Steel reinforcement compliance records
Specification Reference: TABG-JEC-0-000-STR-SPC-7500-B Structural Specification - STEEL REINFORCEMENT COMPLIANCE 6.1.7
Test Required: Schedules shall be prepared by the supplier and  reviewed/accepted by CEL prior to fabrication.
Task Timing or Task Frequency: Prior to manufacturing any reinforcement
Acceptance Criteria: Manufacturer´s Mill Certificate/Rebar schedule/Rebar summary sheet
Task Timing or Task Frequency: Before placement of any site concrete, Scala penetrometer testing, proof roll.
Acceptance Criteria: SITE TO BE INSPECTED BY AN EXPERIENCED GEOTECHNICAL ENGINEER AND CONFIRM SUITABILITY FOR MINIMUM 100 kPa ULTIMATE BEARING CAPACITY.
Specification Reference: As per IFC Drawings and approved CAD files
Task Timing or Task Frequency: Before placement of any site concrete check sub grade profile
• Finished height for sub grade + 10/-50mm. Minimum thickness to be 50mm as per IFC Drawing.
• Target RL  as per IFC Drawings.
Specification Reference: As per IFC Drawings and approved CAD files
Task Timing or Task Frequency: Thickness, minimum 50mm, consider 75mm depending on subgrade.
Acceptance Criteria: Finished height for site concrete to be within +/- 10mm. Thickness, minimum 50mm, consider 75mm depending on subgrade.
Specification Reference: As per IFC Drawings and approved CAD files
Test Required: Surveying as built/Visual Check
Task Timing or Task Frequency: For set out of each Foundation. After placement of Formwork. Top of Foundations to be sloped 1:200 to avoid ponding
Acceptance Criteria: Finished height of embebded items +/- 10mm vertically and +/-20mm laterally
Task Timing or Task Frequency: Pre pour inspection for  each Pour or Foundation
Acceptance Criteria: Pre pour inspection check sheet
Test Required: QA Documents and PS4, Visual inspection
Task Timing or Task Frequency: For each Foundation Embeded items
• As per specifications. Confirmation from Engineer.
• Deviation of Centerlins of the plate relative to the specified positions of the cenre-lines to be +/- 10mm vertically and Laterally
Acceptance Criteria: Backfilling with site won material with small plate compactor in confined space and static roll with 4T Roller where applicable with max. of 300mm lift
Task Timing or Task Frequency: For each Pour
Acceptance Criteria: Confirmation From Engineer on as built records & redline mark ups
Completion Inspection inc.  Construction Defects Report
Test Required: Completion inspection on the structure by CEL
Task Timing or Task Frequency: For each structure
Acceptance Criteria: Provided a completed construction defect report that that details any remedial measure taken, snag lists closed out
